text: Ya 'Ayyuha Al-Ladhina 'Amanu La Tubtilu Sadaqatikum Bil-Manni Wa Al-'Adha Kalladhi Yunfiqu Malahu Ri'a'a An-Nasi Wa La Yu'uminu Billahi Wa Al-Yawmi Al-'Akhiri Famathaluhu Kamathali Safwanin `Alayhi Turabun Fa'asabahu Wa Abilun Fatarakahu Saldaan La Yaqdiruna `Ala Shay'in Mimma Kasabu Wa Allahu La Yahdi Al-Qawma Al-Kafirina
